text: USS Relief may refer to: *, a store ship launched in 1836 and sold in 1883 *, a hospital ship commissioned in 1909 and sold in 1919 *, purchased in 1917 and used as a lookout station tender in Maine; sold in 1921 *, a salvage tug, in commission from 1918 to 1919 *, a lightship built in 1904 and out of service in the 1920s *, a hospital ship commissioned in 1920 and decommissioned in 1946 See also * , a former United States Coast Guard lightship launched in 1950 and out of service in 1976, now a museum ship Category:United States Navy ship names
title: USS Relief
